call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - January 16th 2025 PART 2

decisions.decision: The next node release will be a dedicated release with only the PR that fixes regenerating block candidates, requiring mining pool updates
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.context: To address transaction inclusion delays where transactions don't get included in current block but N+1 or N+2
decisions.quote: The plan for the next one is to include fixes for indexer. There are, I believe, a couple of other PRs for next miner releases. And then we can do that release with only PR, which is about regenerating block candidates.

commitments.commitment: Cornell BRICK system will be introduced to students when they return on Tuesday
commitments.quote: Students at Cornell come back come back on Tuesday because we have Martin Luther King down I believe but the good news is that's when That's when they'll be introduced to the Cornell BRICK.

commitments.commitment: Will hopefully have local DevNet with transactions properly going into input blocks
commitments.quote: In case of luck, maybe next week there will be a local DevNet on my machine with all those things done with transactions properly going into input blocks.

commitments.commitment: Will prioritize reviewing node PRs that are blocking releases
commitments.quote: Yeah. So we should say, yeah, we should, I should certainly prioritize reviewing that I think, and whatever is sequential.
